# Moonsec Lua Deobfuscator

A pure browser-based tool for deobfuscating Moonsec-protected Lua scripts. No server required - everything runs locally in your browser!

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

1. Visit the [live site](https://YOUR_USERNAME.github.io/Moonsec-Deobfuscator-Web/)
2. Paste your obfuscated Lua code
3. Click "Deobfuscate Code"
4. Copy or download the cleaned code

## ğŸ› ï¸ Supported Obfuscations

- Base64 encoding/decoding

- Junk code removal
- Multiple obfuscation layers
